title: Council Reckoning
outcome: As unrest grows, the Council is compelled to hold a rare public assembly. Factions clash live, with citizens pressing for self-governance. The outcome: Stenograd fractures into neighborhoods governed by their chosen values, decided by the Shadow Ballot.

events.description: Facing mounting unrest, the Council calls a live citywide assembly. Factions present radically different futures—martial order, total reset, and full participatory governance.
For the first time, citizens use the Shadow Ballot to rank their district’s priorities. Results vary: some want safety, others demand autonomy or fairness.
Neighborhoods receive tailored BCI adjustments based on ballot results; rules and privileges diverge sharply, igniting debate and tension across Stenograd.
As districts embrace their ranked values, the city rapidly splits into semi-autonomous enclaves. The Council’s role shrinks as local assemblies emerge.
A new era dawns: Stenograd becomes a patchwork of self-governing neighborhoods, each shaped by the choices of its people and the lingering shadow of Halden’s system.
